name: SUCCESS
description: Lovingly handcrafted in my California home. Every single letter is hammered into the disc by hand- no two bracelets are exactly the same. These simple bracelets serve as a small note of encouragement, inspiration, and love. They can be worn at all times - even while singing in the shower, dancing in the rain, or surfing in the ocean. Every bracelet means something special to me and my hope is that this is passed on to everyone that wears one. Sterling silver bracelet with the word SUCCESS. Ladies bracelet measures 6 1/2" Men's bracelet measures 7 1/4" Please select a size and cord color from the list:

name: Sterling Silver Necklaces
description:
Coming Soon!

Our bracelets are definitely our bestsellers, but we've added necklaces as well!

Our necklaces will be available with a sterling silver disc or goldfilled disc. This listing is for a disc on cord (see photo below). You'll be able to choose from a variety of cord colors. 

You can also upgrade to a sterling silver chain or a goldfilled chain ranging from 16" up to 24"

name: Leather Cuffs
description:
Coming soon!

Ladies cuffs come in four beautiful shades of black and brown. We were also able to obtain two additional colors for Spring that will brighten up your day! The ladies cuffs measure 1/2" wide and 7"-7 1/2" long.

Men's cuffs come in four shades of black and brown. The cuffs measure 1" wide and 7 1/2"-8" long.

As always, each letter is stamped by hand one at a time. The leather is also cut by hand and the adjustable snaps are hammered into the leather. The edges of the leather are sealed, giving each piece a nice clean finish.

name: Upgrade to Gold
description:
See something that you like, but would rather have it in gold?

No problem =)

Everything listed in my shop can be made with gold-filled materials instead of sterling silver. When you purchase this listing along with another item, your purchase will automatically be upgraded to gold-fill.

name: Custom Order // Quote or Phrase Bracelet
description:
Love our bracelets, but want one made especially for you? We can make it happen! Add this listing to your shopping cart and let us know what you would like.

This listing is for a sterling silver bracelet with your choice of any quote or phrase.

While making your payment through PayPal, please select the "note to seller" button located below your mailing address. Type in the word you would like.

Have questions? Send an email to: info@ShopHammered.com and we'll respond as quickly as possible.

If you have any trouble while making your purchase, we'll walk you through every step over the phone.

They can be worn at all times - even while singing in the shower, dancing in the rain, or surfing in the ocean. Every bracelet means something special to me and my hope is that this is passed on to everyone that wears one.


Sterling silver bracelet with the words TI AMO ("I love you" in Italian).

Ladies bracelet measures 6 1/2"
Men's bracelet measures 7 1/2"

Please select a size and cord color from the list:
